channel.title: News : NPR
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2022 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Kinder Eggs, other chocolate products recalled due to salmonella outbreak in Europe
item.description: The Kinder products are being recalled across Europe and Canada. It was not immediately clear whether the recall involved products sold in the United States.
item.content:encoded:
The Kinder products are being recalled across Europe and Canada. It was not immediately clear whether the recall involved products sold in the United States.

(Image credit: Laurie Dieffembacq/BELGA MAG/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Speaker Nancy Pelosi has tested positive for COVID
item.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, 82, has been vaccinated against COVID-19 and received a booster shot. She's the highest profile U.S. official to contract the virus since former President Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded:
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, 82, has been vaccinated against COVID-19 and received a booster shot. She's the highest profile U.S. official to contract the virus since former President Donald Trump.

(Image credit: Ken Cedeno/AP)
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt

item.title: U.S. life expectancy falls for 2nd year in a row
item.description: The pandemic drove U.S. life expectancy down again in 2021 even though life-saving vaccines were widely available.
item.content:encoded:
The pandemic drove U.S. life expectancy down again in 2021 even though life-saving vaccines were widely available.

(Image credit: Scott Olson/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Rob Stein

item.title: Woman wins $10 million after accidentally pushing the wrong button on lottery machine
item.description: LaQuedra Edwards had put $40 into a lottery vending machine at a supermarket in Los Angeles when "some rude person" bumped into her, causing her to buy a different lottery ticket than she intended.
item.content:encoded:
LaQuedra Edwards had put $40 into a lottery vending machine at a supermarket in Los Angeles when "some rude person" bumped into her, causing her to buy a different lottery ticket than she intended.

(Image credit: John Locher/AP)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Rapper Kidd Creole is convicted of manslaughter in a 2017 fatal stabbing
item.description: The rapper, whose real name is Nathaniel Glover, was on trial over the death of John Jolly, who was stabbed twice in the chest with a steak knife in midtown Manhattan in August 2017.
item.content:encoded:
The rapper, whose real name is Nathaniel Glover, was on trial over the death of John Jolly, who was stabbed twice in the chest with a steak knife in midtown Manhattan in August 2017.

(Image credit: Steven Hirsch/AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Putin's daughters were just sanctioned. Here's what we know about them
item.description: Details about Katerina Tikhonova and Maria Vorontsova have long been shrouded in secrecy. The U.S. says Putin's two daughters — one a doctor, the other a tech executive — may be hiding his assets.
item.content:encoded:
Details about Katerina Tikhonova and Maria Vorontsova have long been shrouded in secrecy. The U.S. says Putin's two daughters — one a doctor, the other a tech executive — may be hiding his assets.

(Image credit: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Laurel Wamsley

item.title: Many harried election officials are eyeing the exit. But new workers are stepping up
item.description: A recent survey found that 20% of election workers say they are unlikely to continue in their role in the 2024 election cycle. Here are some of the new faces joining the ranks.
item.content:encoded:
A recent survey found that 20% of election workers say they are unlikely to continue in their role in the 2024 election cycle. Here are some of the new faces joining the ranks.

(Image credit: Sandy Huffaker/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler
